About the Company: Liberty Shoes (LSL), incorporated on the 3rd September, 1986 as a Public Limited Company and obtained the Certificate of Commencement of Business on 11th March 1988. The company has been set up to manufacture and sell leather and non leather shoes ,leather shoe uppers and leather garments Presently the company is engaged in the manufacturing of leather and non leather shoes.
